{"id":1400280562,"question_id":3329,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 1 week","timestamp":1727150428,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"353 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1400280562/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Length of the Longest Common Prefix","memory":"165.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int longestCommonPrefix(vector<int>& arr1, vector<int>& arr2) {\n        unordered_map<int, int> m;\n        for (int i=0; i<(int)arr1.size(); i++) {\n            while (arr1[i] > 0) {\n                m[arr1[i]]++;\n                arr1[i] /= 10;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        int ans = 0;\n        const auto fn = [](int k) {\n            int i=0;\n            while (k > 0) {\n                k /= 10;\n                i++;\n            }\n            return i;\n        };\n        for (int i=0; i<(int)arr2.size(); i++) {\n            while (arr2[i] > 0) {\n                if (m[arr2[i]]) {\n                    ans = max(ans, fn(arr2[i]));\n                }\n                arr2[i] /= 10;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-length-of-the-longest-common-prefix","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
